entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a teacher who blew his whistle to stop the students from practicing spells. (Excerpt: 'He blew his whistle; everybody stopped shouting...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the students who was practicing spells with his friends. (Excerpt: 'Well, that was pretty good,' said Harry...)

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is a student who enthusiastically agreed to meet again next week. (Excerpt: 'Sooner!' said Dean Thomas eagerly...)

relationships.description: Harry was stopped by Filch from continuing to practice spells. (Excerpt: 'He blew his whistle; everybody stopped shouting...')
Dean Thomas agreed with Harry's suggestion to meet again next week. (Excerpt: 'Sooner!' said Dean Thomas eagerly and many people nodded in agreement.)
Angelina disagreed with Harry's suggestion to meet again next week. (Excerpt: 'The Quidditch seasonâ€™s about to start, we need team practices too!' said Angelina.)
